title: A COURT OF DARKNESS
description: Braelyn Sarraret is a killer, a trained killer. From a young age, her father has trained her to be the most feared hunter in the land—the deadliest of them all. When Braelyn's father sends her on one of the deadliest of missions, will she survive? The Fae and their creatures have become weak. When the queen left, all their powers seemed to stop. The land started to die. None of the Fae expected their powers to stop with the queen gone. How will they protect themselves without their magic? How will they survive?Though she now has the powers of the Fae, her heart remains human, and she can’t forget the terrible deeds she performed to save her people. But only if she can harness her harrowing gifts, heal her fractured soul, and decide how she wishes to shape her future—and the future of a world cleaved in two. Will the love from the King Of the Dark Court save her from destruction, or will the darkness overcome her?
author: Autumn R.  Degree
